title: Guided Meditation for Children | Your Secret Treehouse | Relaxation for Kids
description:
Download our App for free:

Apple iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/new-horizon-kids-meditation/id1457179117#?
Google Play (Android): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.co.newhorizonholisticcentre.app
Amazon: Coming soon!

We would like to thank you all for your support, it has meant so much to us and we hope to continue to grow together. 

If you like our work we would really appreciate a nice review in the App store to help us get it going :-)

You can find out more details about our App here: https://www.newhorizonholisticcentre.co.uk/newhorizonapp.html

=====================================================
Tool we used to grow our YouTube channel from nothing (Highly recommend!): https://www.tubebuddy.com/newhorizonsleeprelaxation

Download Meditation for Kids Mega Pack here: https://newhorizon.selz.com/item/59b288a9cca9180c30ef421f
30 of our best Kids Meditations at a reduced price!

Download FREE Guided Meditation for Kids: https://newhorizon.selz.com/item/5989e711cca9180b0c0c21d4

Download New Guided Meditation for Kids Album: https://store.cdbaby.com/cd/newhorizonholisticcentre42
Also available from iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/guided-meditations-for-kids/id1256088681
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/music/album/New_Horizon_Holistic_Centre_Guided_Meditations_for?id=B7arooc7umjhffu2k2zytb3vwxe&hl=en

In this Guided Meditation we take the child on a journey to their peaceful place; to their secret treehouse in the forest where they find pure relaxation.

This is aimed at making the child feel safe and re-establish feelings of tranquility when suffering challenging emotions such as stress, worry & anxiety.

Enjoy your journey to your secret treehouse!

**3 HOUR 'MUSIC ONLY' VERSION CAN BE FOUND HERE**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R240eC5KTEA

#kidsmeditation #kidssleep #meditationforkids

channelDescription:
We create Guided Meditations and Sleep Stories for both Adults and Kids which are being used by Parents, Teachers and Therapists worldwide.

We spend a lot of time writing, performing and producing original content to help you (or your child) to heal,  relax or just whisk you off to a place of peace and tranquility!

We would love you to join us on the journey :-)

***   Please check out our new app (which can be downloaded for free) here: https://www.newhorizonholisticcentre.co.uk/newhorizonapp   ***

DISCLAIMER
All content provided by ‘New Horizon Holistic Centre’ is intended for entertainment purposes only. 
None of our content is intended to offer medical or health-related advice and must never be used as such.
Do not use any of our material whilst driving or in any situation where it is not safe to relax and fall asleep.
